snippet: Mike Rice’s dismissal after the release of a video did little to quiet critics, who called for the jobs of university officials and asked why Mr. Rice was not fired sooner.
abstract: Dismissal of Rutgers men's basketball coach Mike Rice, following viral video of his abusive behavior toward players, has done little to quiet public outcry; many critics are insisting that university officials, including athletic director Tim Pernetti and president Robert L Barchi, also be held accountable for their handling of case.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER and KATE ZERNIKE

lead_paragraph: Mike Rice’s dismissal after the release of a video did little to quiet critics, who called for the jobs of university officials and asked why Mr. Rice was not fired sooner.

headline.seo: Rutgers Fires Basketball Coach Mike Rice After Video Goes Public
headline.main: Rutgers Leaders Are Faulted on Abusive Coach
headline.print_headline: Rutgers Leaders Are Faulted on Abusive Coach

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
